short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Common plugin to record and stream desktop over call

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension captures  and streams the whiteboard and video of an online class ,which is saved in  a server as the recording of that class. Users need to install this to record the classes for viewing it later.
